content: It attracts to you<N>all nearby coins and gems
Someone were defeated here.<N>Maybe it was YOU!
Welcome to the Tower of Destiny!<N><N>Your goal is to climb up the tower<N>as high as possible and score<N>as many points as you can.<N><N>Open chests, pick up gems and<N>avoid dangerous obstacles.
Tap on the screen to JUMP
Click to JUMP<N>(or press SPACE key)
Excellent! Now pick up that gem
Good! Now open up that chest
Awesome! Now jump on that ladder!
Congratulations!<N><N>You're doing great!<N>But from now you will go alone.<N><N>Here is a hint for you:<N><N>JUMP ON AN ENEMY TO DEFEAT IT!<N><N>Good luck!!!
Leave the Tower?<N><N>Your progress<N>will be saved
Save the kitty to make<N>the world a little bit better<N>and to get additional score points
You can buy something<N>valuable in the<N>Shop of Upgrades
Saved game state from<N>Google Play<N>successfully loaded
Congrats!<N>You've unlocked 5 lives,<N>100 gems and 150 coins<N>thanks to <X>!
You can change<N>Hero's look<N>in the Wardrobe
